title: Akron Beacon Journal - Wikipedia
snippet: The Akron Beacon Journal is a morning newspaper in Akron, Ohio, United States. Owned by Gannett, it is the sole daily newspaper in Akron and is distributed throughout Northeast Ohio. The paper's coverage focuses on local news.

title: Akron Beacon Journal - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
snippet: Akron Beacon Journal Publishing Company Inc. publishes a newspaper.

title: Akron Beacon Journal/Ohio.com - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
snippet: Akron Beacon Journal/Ohio.com acquired by GateHouse Media Inc.

title: Akron Beacon Journal sold to GateHouse Media
snippet: The Pulitzer Prize-winning Akron Beacon Journal and its Ohio.com website are joining the GateHouse Media family, which owns The Columbus Dispatch, The Canton Repository, and about 60 other Ohio publications and their websites â€“ all among the ...

title: Akron Beacon Journal Sold to GateHouse Media, Owner of Columbus Dispatch, Canton Repository
snippet: The Akron Beacon Journal has been sold to Gatehouse Media, the largest publisher of daily newspapers in the United States and the owner of the Columbus Dispatch, the Canton Repository and a preponderance of smaller-town dailies.
